description: This table stores a list of medication orders that are related to a procedure order. Technologists can mark a medication as related to procedure in End Exam navigator.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_REL_MEDS_ID
columns.description: The medication order IDs related to an imaging procedure.
